//passport requirements strings Requirements to proceed your passport process: Requirement_description Requirement_title
Procedure
Ethiopia is currently issuing electronic passports that require fingerprints. Therefore,all applicants must be made in-person at the Main Department for Immigration and Nationality Affairs offices or Embassy of Ethiopia if the applicant is abroad.
Application for a new Ethiopian passport in Ethiopia
- Application form is provided which should duly fill before submission.

- The following documents are to be attached together with the application document:

1. Recent passport-sized colour photo.

2. A clear scanned or picture of an identity card.

3. The correct fee must be enclosed with your application.Please make sure that the fee is exact amount in required currency.

- One should then proceed to have their fingerprint impression taken in the immigration office with your original documents when you get notification message.

- The processing time at is 1-3 days depending on your inquiry and one is required to collect the passport through post office or in person.

- The day of collection will be communicated by notification message.

Application for a new Ethiopian passport for a new Child Born Abroad
A child born outside of Ethiopia to an Ethiopian citizen parent(s) is eligible for Ethiopian citizenship.

- The parent must answer all the questions outlined in the application form and provide their fingerprints.

- Applicants under the age of 14 are exempted from providing fingerprints.

The following documents are required to be attached when together with the application:

1. The completed Ethiopian passport application form.

2. Clear recent passport-sized colour photo.

3. Clear scanned or picture of documents certifying the parent(s) Ethiopian Citizenship.

4. Clear scanned or picture of the child's birth certificate.

5. The correct fee must be enclosed with your application.

- As Ethiopian passports are issued in Ethiopia.It may take up to two months to process the application. We will notify you by notification message when the passport has been issued and ready to collection.

- Applicants are required to collect their passport in person at consular section or through post office.

Application for renewal Ethiopian passport in Ethiopia
- Renewal application form is provided which should duly fill before submission.

- The following documents are to be attached together with the application document:

1. Recent passport-sized colour photo.

2. A clear scanned or picture of an identity card.

3. Scanned or picture of original expired passport.

4. The correct fee must be enclosed with your application. Please make sure that the fee is exact amount in required currency.

- One should then proceed to have their fingerprint impression taken in the immigration office with your original documents when you get notification message.

- The processing time at is 1-3 days depending on your inquiry and one is required to collect the passport through post office or in person.

- The day of collection will be communicated by notification message.

Urgent Services
If you are applying for Urgent Services, you must have reason or evidence like:


- Medical letter

- Scholarship and DV

- Letter from authorized organization

- Foreign residence permit 

- Invitation paper 

- Urgent travel for work

- Travel for compassionate reason 

Application for a lost or damaged Ethiopian passport in Ethiopia
Replacement for Lost/Damaged passport all the same requirements as applying for an Ethiopian passport.

- Lost/Damaged application form is provided which should duly fill before submission.

- The following documents are to be attached together with the application document:

1. Recent passport-sized colour photo.

2. A clear scanned or picture of an identity card.

3. Proof of police record.

4. Scanned or picture of lost passport(if available)

5. The correct fee must be enclosed with your application. Please make sure that the fee is exact amount in required currency.

- One should then proceed to have their fingerprint impression taken in the immigration office with your original documents when you get notification message.

- The processing time at is 1-3 days depending on your inquiry and one is required to collect the passport through post office or in person.

- The day of collection will be communicated by notification message.

Required Documents
- A clear recent passport-sized colour photographs(3\*4 cm size).

- A clear scanned or picture of documents certifying the parent(S) Ethiopian citizenship.

- A clear scanned or picture of the child's birth certificate.

- Proof of payment of application processing fees.Please make sure that the fee is exact amount in required currency.

- A completed Ethiopian passport application form.

Eligibility
- One need to be an Ethiopian citizen.

- The child needs to be born of Ethiopian parents.

Validity
- The Ethiopian passport is valid for 5 year from after being processed.

Need for the Document
- The document is used for identification purposes.

- It is one of the requirements needed when traveling across international borders.

Processing Time
- The processing time at Ethiopian immigration is 1-3 days depending your inquiry.

- It takes up to two months to process the application from abroad.

Emergency
Emergency requests are handled in INVEA main office or branch offices in person. 

Others
The Ethiopian passport is a travel document issued to citizens of Ethiopia for international travel. The document is a biometric machine-readable passport with a burgundy cover with the text "Federal Democratic Republic of Ethiopia" above the coat of arms,and the text "passport" below it in English and Amharic.The passport is valid for 5 years and contains 32 pages.

//Faq strings Faq_description Faq_title
What is the processing time for Ethiopian e-Passport?/
Under normal circumstance,the e-passport processing time is up to 3 days though it can be earlier.
What is the processing time for Ethiopian e-Visa?
Under normal circumstance,the e-passport processing time is up to 3 days though it can be earlier. so,it is advisable to apply at least 3 days before your departure.
Will Passport physically in Ethiopian Immigration Nationality And Vital Events Agency continue to issue passport after Ethiopia launches online passport application?
Yes.You can also get passport on your nearest Ethiopian Immigration Nationality And Vital Events Agency.
Will Visa-on-arrival and Ethiopian Embassies continue to issue visa after Ethiopia launches online visa and passport application?
Yes.You can also get visa on your arrival(if you are eligible)at Addis Abeba Bole International Airport or at your nearest Ethiopian Embassy.
Is it possible to send picture files of my passport,photo and/or resident permit instead of scans while applying for Ethiopian e-Visa and e-Passport?
Yes.As far as it is clearly visible you can upload camera-captured picture files(in supported image formats) of your passport,photo and/or residence permit documents.
Can i contact any Ethiopian embassy to check on the status of my e-Visa?
No.Please check your e-Visa status online. Once e-Visa is approved,an approval letter is sent directly to your email address or notification.
What are the benefits of online visa application over visa on arrival?
The online visa application saves your time. There are no visits to embassies or consulates and no complex paperwork. The online process is very easy, more secure than traditional visa application processes and it allows you to have your approved e-Visa ready before you leave for your trip.It also saves your money like air ticket hotel reservations since there are chances that you would be denied of visa on arrival.You will also be able to beat the long queues at the airport.
What are the benefits of online passport application over passport on physical?
The online passport application saves your time. There are no visits to Immigration Offices and no complex paperwork. The online process is very easy, more secure than traditional passport application processes and it allows you to have your approved passport ready before you leave for your trip.You will also be able to beat the long queues at the Immigration Offices.
May i know the reason why the application is rejected?
If it is rejected,the office will notify you of the rejection but not the reason why.
Do i get a refund if my application is rejected?
Payment of the application fee does not guarantee approval of a visa. Unfortunately, we are not able to refund as we have clearly stated in our Terms Conditions.
When does validity of my e-visa start? Is it from the date of entry to Ethiopia or date of issue?
The validity of Ethiopian e-Visa starts from the date of entry to Ethiopia you selected while applying your application not from the date of issue.
I entered one or more of my personal information(Full Name/Nationality/Passport Number/Email address, ete.) incorrectly.Could you please modify it?
Applicants are prompted to confirm all the provided information are correct and accurate before submitting the application form. Our e-Visa system is not able to update or modify any of the information applicants have entered wrongly. Applicants are responsible to provide all the information correctly and accurately to avoid unnecessary issues at Ethiopian Immigration counter upon arrival. We do encourage to make sure all the information provided are correct before submitting the application.
How do i receive my e-visa Approval Letter?
When your e-Visa application has been approved, an approval letter is sent to your designated email address or through notification message. Alternatively you may check the status of your request for e-visa directly from our application and download if from your e-mail if approved.
How do i receive my final passport?
You can get your passport by Your postal address.
//visa requirement strings
Things You Should Know About Ethiopian e-Visa
Please refer the following requirements for Ethiopian e-VISA:
 - Nationals of African States who can't make e-Visa payment online can apply online and make the payment on arrival at Addis Ababa Bole International Airport in cash.

 Please carefully read and comply to the important notices and guidelines stated in each step of the application form.
 - The validity of Ethiopian e-Visa starts from the date you intend to enter Ethiopia not from date of issue.
 - Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months from the date you intend to enter Ethiopia.
 - e-Visa application fees are not refundable.
 - A passport size photo and scanned copy of passport is required.

International Organizations/Embassies Work Visa - RI
International organizations/embassies work visa is issued to foreign nationals with ordinary passports who are invited by international organizations or embassies resident in Ethiopian for different work purposes.

 Requirements:

 - Copy of the following documents is mandatory.
 - Recent passport-size photo of the applicant.
 - Passport of the visa applicant which is valid for at least 6 months from the intended date of entry to Ethiopia.
 - Formal application letter by the organization/embassies to the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Ethiopia.
 - Note verbal or support letter from Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Ethiopia.

 Processing Time:
 - Under normal circumstances, the processing time for international organizations/embassies work visa is 3 days. So, travelers should submit their application at least 3 days before their estimated date of arrival.

 Duration and Validity:
 - The validity of the international organizations/embassies work visa starts counting from the date intended to enter Ethiopia

Tourist Visa - VT

Tourist visa is an electronic single-entry visa issued by the Ethiopian Government for visitors who wish to travel to the country for tourism or other non-business related purposes only.

 Eligibility:
 - Citizens of all countries in the globe are eligible for tourist visa provided that the below requirements are fulfilled.

 Requirements:
 - Copy of the following documents is mandatory.
 - Recent passport-size photo of the applicant.
 - Passport of the visa applicant which is valid for at least 6 months from the intended date of entry to Ethiopia.

 Processing Time:
 - Under normal circumstances, the processing time for tourist visa is 3 days. So, travelers should submit their application at least 3 days before their estimated date of arrival.

 Duration and Validity:
 - Single entry tourist visa is valid up to 90 days starting from the intended date of arrival in Ethiopia. If arrival date of the travelers is changed, travelers should contact the e-Visa Support Team at Support@evisa.gov.et to adjust validity period of their visa.

 Extension:
 - Travelers can request for extension before the visa expires by going in person to the Head Office of The Immigration, Nationality and Vital Events Agency (Addis Ababa, Ethiopia). Travelers who stay beyond the validity period without extending are subject to fines and legal penalties.

Visa On Arrival
Tourist visa (valid for up to three months) can be issued on arrival at Addis Ababa Bole International Airport to nationals of the following countries and territories,or persons holding residence permits issued by these countries or territories.

 Applicants who claim to have permanent residence in one of the eligible countries are required to show valid residence permit document up on arrival.

 Good News!
 - Ethiopia has officially launched Visa-On-Arrival service for tourists from all African Union member states.
 - Nationals of Africa Union member states can pay the visa fee in cash at Bole International Airport to get tourist visa.
 - We encourage you to submit your visa applications online so that you will be notified of the status ahead of your travel and avoid inconveniences that might be created in case you are denied entry.

 Below are additional countries whose citizens are eligible for visa on arrival.
 - Check your country if it is in blow list:

 Argentina, Australia, Austria, Belgium, Canada, China, Denmark, Djibouti (Exempted - Allowed to enter without visa.), France, Greece, Hong Kong-China, India, Israel, Italy, Japan, Kenya (Exempted - Allowed to enter without visa.), Macau-China, Mexico, Netherlands, New zealand, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Russia, South Korea, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Thailand, United Kingdom, United States.
Journalist Visa - JV

Journalist visa is issued to foreign Journalists, media professionals or film makers, coming to cover events, report for media organizations or produce films, TV or written material of various kinds.

 Requirements:
 Copy of the following documents is mandatory.
 - Recent passport-size photo of the applicant.
 - Passport of the visa applicant which is valid for at least 6 months from the intended date of entry to Ethiopia.
 - Written application by the inviting institution or company.
 - Support Letter from Ministry of foreign Affairs or Government communications office of Ethiopia.

 Processing Time:
 - Under normal circumstances, the processing time for tourist visa is 3 days. So, travelers should submit their application at least 3 days before their estimated date of arrival.

 Duration and Validity:
 - The Validity of the Visa starts counting from the date intended to enter Ethiopia Travelers can request for extension before the visa expires by going in person to the Head Office of The Immigration, Nationality and Vital Events Agency (Addis Ababa, Ethiopia).

 Extension:
 - Journalist visa can't be extended.

Investment Visa - IV

This is a visa issued to foreign Nationals who are engaged in investment activities. It can also be issued to potential investors who wish to come and invest in Ethiopia.

 Requirements:
 - Recent passport-size photo and passport copy of the traveler which has at least 6 months validity from the date of entry are mandatory.
 Additionally, if the traveler is coming to invest or see investment opportunities in Ethiopia for the first time, the requirement is:
 - A support letter( a proof that you are traveling for investment purpose) from the nearest Embassy of Ethiopia.
 If the traveler is invited by a company that has been involved in investment activities in Ethiopia, the requirements are:
 - Official application letter written by the inviting company addressed to the Immigration, Nationality and Vital Events Agency of Ethiopia.
 - Business License of the inviting company.
 - Support Letter from Investment Commission of Ethiopia.

 Processing Time:
 - Under normal circumstances, the processing time for tourist visa is 3 days. So, travelers should submit their application at least 3 days before their estimated date of arrival.

 Duration and Validity:
 - The Validity of the Visa starts counting from the date intended to Enter Ethiopia Travelers can request for extension before the visa expires by going in person to the Head Office of The Immigration, Nationality and Vital Events Agency(Addis Ababa, Ethiopia).

Ethiopian Government Institutions Short Task Visa - GIV

Government Institutions Short Task Visa is issued to foreign nationals who wish to enter Ethiopia to accomplish certain tasks for government institutions for a short period of time.

 Requirements:
 Copy of the following documents is mandatory.
 - Recent passport-size photo of the applicant.
 - Passport of the visa applicant which is valid for at least 6 months from the intended date of entry to Ethiopia.
 - Written application letter by relevant Government institution.

 Processing Time:
 - Under normal circumstances, the processing time for visa is 3 days. So, travelers should submit their application at least 3 days before their estimated date of arrival.

 Duration and Validity:
 - The Validity of the visa starts counting from the date intended to enter Ethiopia. Travelers can request for extension before the visa expires by going in person to the Head Office of The Immigration, Nationality and Vital Events Agency (Addis Ababa, Ethiopia).

Non-Governmental Organizations(NGO) Work Visa - NV

An NGO visa is a visa issued to those foreign nationals who are invited by NGOs operating in Ethiopia for Employment or short term assignments.

 Requirements:
 Copy of the following documents is mandatory.
 - Recent passport-size photo of the applicant.
 - Passport of the visa applicant which is valid for at least 6 months from the intended date of entry to Ethiopia.
 - Official application letter written by the inviting organization and addressed to the Immigration, Nationality and Vital Events Agency of Ethiopia.
 - Registration License of the inviting organization.

 Processing Time:
 - Under normal circumstances, the processing time for tourist visa is 3 days. So, travelers should submit their application at least 3 days before their estimated date of arrival.

 Duration and Validity:
 - The Validity of the visa starts counting from the date intended to enter Ethiopia.

 Extension:
 - NGO Visa cannot be extended.

Conference Visa - CV

A conference visa is issued to those who wish to visit Ethiopia for International conferences provided that they have an invitation to the conference, seminar or workshop being organized in Ethiopia by a Ministry or Department of the Government of Federal Democratic Republic of Ethiopia, Regional State Governments, Educational Institutions and Universities or organizations owned by the private sector or by the Government of Ethiopia, United Nations or its specialized agencies, African Union or reputed NGOs.

 Requirements:

 - Recent passport-size photo, copy of passport of the applicant which is valid for at least 6 months from the intended entry date to Ethiopia and invitation letter are required.

 - Please refer to the following additional requirements.
 - Inviting company category:Governmental(Ethiopian)
 Description - Any governmental organization, ministry, department or educational institution of the Government of Ethiopia.
\ Required Documents: Formal application letter written by the inviting company to the Immigration, Nationality and Vital Events Agency of Ethiopia.


- Inviting company category: International Organizations
 Description: Any International or Inter-Governmental Organizations such as United Nations and Africa Union
 Required Documents: - Formal application letter written by the inviting organization to the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Ethiopia.
 - Note Verbal(support letter) from the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Ethiopia.


Inviting company category:NGO
 Description:Non-Governmental organizations(NGOs) which are REGISTERED in Ethiopia
 Required Documents:- Formal application letter written by the inviting organization to the Immigration, Nationality and Vital Events Agency of Ethiopia.
 - Registration license of the inviting organization.


Inviting company category: Private
 Description: Any legal private company registered and based in Ethiopia
 Required Documents:- Application letter written by the inviting company to the Immigration, Nationality and Vital Events Agency of Ethiopia.
 - Business License(renewed for the fiscal year) of the inviting company.
 - Taxpayer Identification Number(TIN) certificate(renewed for the fiscal year) of the inviting company.

 Note:
 - Invitation Letter: issued by the inviting company/organization to the participant should describe the conference briefly such as conference name, start date, end date and venue.
 - Note verbal: is a letter from the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Ethiopia to the Immigration, Nationality and Vital Events Agency stating that an organization/company has officially requested for visa.

 Duration and Validity:
 The conference visa is a 30 (thirty)-day single entry visa whose validity starts from the intended date of entry to Ethiopia.

 Extension:
 Conference Visa can not be extended.

Ethiopian Government Employment Visa - GV
Government employment visa issued to foreign nationals to be employed by different Ethiopian Government institutions/ministries.

 Requirements
 Copy of the following documents is mandatory.
 - Recent passport-size photo of the applicant.
 - Passport of the visa applicant which is valid for at least 6 months from the intended date of entry to Ethiopia.
 - Written application letter by relevant Government institution.

 Processing Time
 - Under normal circumstances, the processing time for tourist visa is 3 days. So, travelers should submit their application at least 3 days before their estimated date of arrival.

 Duration and Validity
 - The Validity of the Visa starts counting from the date intended to Enter Ethiopia Travelers can request for extension before the visa expires by going in person to the Head Office of The Immigration, Nationality and Vital Events Agency (Addis Ababa, Ethiopia).

 Extension
 Travelers can request for extension before the visa expires by going in person to the Head Office of The Main Department for Immigration, Nationality and Vital Events Agency (Addis Ababa, Ethiopia). Travelers who stay beyond the validity period without extending are subject to fines and legal penalties.

Foreign Business Firm Employment Visa - WV
Foreign Business Firm Employment Visa is issued to foreign nationals who are entering Ethiopia to be employed by business firms owned/operated by foreigners.

 Requirements
 Copy of the following documents is mandatory.
 - Recent passport-size photo of the applicant.
 - Passport of the visa applicant which is valid for at least 6 months from the intended date of entry to Ethiopia.
 - Formal application letter by the inviting company.
 - Business license of the inviting company.
 - TIN(Taxpayer Identification Number) Certificate of the inviting company.
 - Contractual agreement between the inviting company and the visa applicant.

 Processing Time
 - Under normal circumstances, the processing time for tourist visa is 3 days. So, travelers should submit their application at least 3 days before their estimated date of arrival.

 Duration and Validity
 - The Validity of the Visa starts counting from the date intended to Enter Ethiopia.

 Extension
 - Travelers can request for extension before the visa expires by going in person to the Head Office of The Immigration, Nationality and Vital Events Agency (Addis Ababa, Ethiopia). Travelers who stay beyond the validity period without extending are subject to fines and legal penalties.

Ethiopian Private Business Firm Work Visa - PE
Private Business Firm Visa is issued to foreign nationals coming for employment or other short term assignments with Ethiopian private business firms.

 Requirements
 Copy of the following documents is mandatory.
 - Recent passport-size photo of the applicant.
 - Passport of the visa applicant which is valid for at least 6 months from the intended date of entry to Ethiopia.
 - Formal application/request letter written by the inviting company and addressed to Main Department for Immigration and Nationality Affairs of Ethiopia.
 - Business license of the inviting company.
 - Taxpayer Identification Number(TIN) Certificate of the inviting company
 - Contractual agreement between the inviting company and the visa applicant.

 Processing Time
 - Under normal circumstances, the processing time for tourist visa is 3 days. So, travelers should submit their application at least 3 days before their estimated date of arrival.

 Duration and Validity
 - The Validity of the Visa starts counting from the date intended to enter Ethiopia Travelers can request for extension before the visa expires by going in person to the Head Office of the Immigration, Nationality and Vital Events Agency (Addis Ababa, Ethiopia).

 Extension
 -Travelers can request for extension before the visa expires by going in person to the Head Office of the Immigration, Nationality and Vital Events Agency (Addis Ababa, Ethiopia). Travelers who stay beyond the validity period without extending are subject to fines and legal penalties.

e-Visa Extension
The visa extension service is a visa service for foreign nationals with valid IV, GV, GIV, WV, RI, PE and VT visas who need to prolong their visas on reasonable grounds. Foreign nationals can extend their visas by going, in person,to the Immigration, Nationality and Vital Events Agency in Addis Ababa (Arada sub-city, Arat Kilo), or by applying online visa extension on this Application. Visitors should n\’t stay for longer than their visa allows. There are consequences of overstaying beyond the validity period of a visa and the foreign nationals who overstay in Ethiopia are subject to fines and legal penalties

Requirements for e-Visa Extension
General Requirements:
 - The passport of the applicant should be valid for at least six months since the date when the validity of the extended visa starts.
 - Student Visa, NGO Visa(NV), Conference Visa(CV), and Journalist Visa( JV Visa) cannot be extended.
 - The validity period of the extended visa will start from the next day after the initial visa expires.

 Additional Specific Requirements
 -Relevant documents should be attached as required when applying for a visa extension.

 For GV and GIV visas:
 - Supporting letter from the relevant government institution

 For WV and PE visas:
 - Supporting letter from the relevant company /business organization
 - Renewed /valid business license of company /business organization

 For IV visas:
 - Supporting letter from the office of Investment Commission of the Government of Ethiopia

 For RI visas:
 -Support letter from international organization or embassy who invited the applicant.
 - Note verbal or support letter from the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Government of Ethiopia.

Online Tourist Visa Fee:
- Single Entry 30 Days 52 USD
 - Single Entry 90 Days 72USD
Journalist Visa Fee:
- Single Entry 30 Days 42 USD
International Organizations/Embassies Work Visa - RI Fee:
- Single Entry 30 Days 52 USD
Investment Visa - IV Fee:
- Single Entry 30 days 32 USD
 - Multiple Entry 90 days 42 USD
 - Multiple Entry 6 months 62 USD
 - Multiple Entry 12 months 122 USD

Ethiopian Government Institutions Short Task Visa - GIV Fee:
- Single Entry 30 days 22 USD
 - Multiple Entry 90 days 82 USD
 - Multiple Entry 6 months 122 USD

Non-Governmental Organizations(NGO) Work Visa - NV Fee:
- Single Entry 30 Days 62 USD

Conference Visa - CV Fee:
- Single Entry 30 Days 32 USD

Ethiopian Government Employment Visa - GV Fee:
- Single Entry 30Days 32 USD

Foreign Business Firm Employment Visa - WV Fee:
- Single Entry 30 Days 42 USD 

Ethiopian Private Business Firm Work Visa - PE Fee:
- Single Entry 30 Days 32 USD

Visa Extension Fee:
The extension fee depends on the number of times the applicant is requesting for a visa extension. An additional service charge of USD 2 will also be added.

 - If the visa is being extended for the first time, there shall be an additional 100% charge above the initial e-visa application fee.

 - If extended for the second time for up to 15 days, there shall be an additional 150% charge above the initial e-visa application fee.

 - If extended for the third time for 10 up to days, there shall be an additional 200% charge above the initial e-visa application fee.

 E.g. If an applicant who applied for single entry 30 days visa is extending his/her visa for the first time, the visa extension fee will be USD 102. This means, USD 50 (initial visa application fee) + USD 50 (additional visa extension charge ) + USD 2(Service Charge) 

Copyright © 2020 ICMS You can proceed to payment now. Please note that your request will not be proceed until you make the payment successfully.
 Total amount to be paid: 52 USD
- Dial *847# (CBE-Birr USSD service) on your phone
 - Reply 5 for Bill Pay
 - Reply 2 for input SHORT CODE
 - Enter 555555 when requested
 - When requested for Bill Reference NO. enter the Application CODE
 - When requested to confirm the payment, Reply 1
 - Enter your CBE-Birr PIN to complete the payment and you are done.

- Tourist Visa is a single-entry visa issued to visitors who wish to travel for touristic purposes only.
 - People with dual nationality should choose the nationality according to the passport to be used for travel. Please select country of citizenship according to your travel document/document.

- Please note that Business Visa is not issued for applicants whose age is under 18.
 - Conference visa is issued to foreign nationals coming to Ethiopia to attend meetings, conferences, workshops, seminars, etc.
- Please note that Business Visa is not issued for applicants whose age is under 18.
 - Journalist visa is issued to foreign Journalists, media professionals or film makers, coming to cover events, reports for media organizations or produce films, TV or written material of various kinds.
- Please note that Business Visa is not issued for applicants whose age is under 18.
 - Foreign Business Firm Employment visa is issued to foreign nationals to be employed by business firms owned or operated by foreigners.
- Please note that Business Visa is not issued for applicants whose age is under 18.
 - GIV visa is issued to foreign nationals who are coming to accomplish certain tasks for government institutions for a short period of time.
- Please note that Business Visa is not issued for applicants whose age is under 18.
 - GV visa issued to foreign nationals to be employed by different Ethiopian government institutions/ministries.
- Please note that Business Visa is not issued for applicants whose age is under 18.
 - Investment visa is issued to foreign nationals who are engaged in investment activities. It can also be issued to potential investors who wish to come to Ethiopia to see investment opportunities or invest in Ethiopia.
- Please note that Business Visa is not issued for applicants whose age is under 18.
 - NGO visa is issued to foreign nationals who are invited by NGOs operating in Ethiopia for employment or short-term assignments.
- Please note that Business Visa is not issued for applicants whose age is under 18.
 - RI visa is issued to foreign nationals with ordinary passports who are invited by internationals organizations or Embassies resident in Ethiopia for different work purposes.
- Please note that Business Visa is not issued for applicants whose age is under 18.
 - Foreign Business Firm Employment visa is issued to foreign nationals to be employed by business firms owned or operated by foreigners.
- Please note that Business Visa is not issued for applicants whose age is under 18.
 - Ethiopian Private Business Firm Work visa is issued to foreign nationals coming for employment or other short-term assignments with Ethiopian private business firms.
- Please make sure all the information provided is correct. The information will be checked against your passport at immigration counter upon arrival. If any of the information mismatches with the one on your passport, you will be denied entry to Ethiopia.
